Package entity

Class Movie

java.lang.Object
entity.Movie
public class Movie extends Object
Represents a movie with all the relevant information
Author:
SS4 Group 4

  • Field Details

    • movieTitle

      @CsvBindByName private String movieTitle
      Title of the movie

    • synopis

      @CsvBindByName private String synopis
      Short synopsis describing the movie

    • director

      @CsvBindByName private String director
      First and last name of the director

    • cast

      @CsvBindAndSplitByName(elementType=java.lang.String.class, collectionType=java.util.ArrayList.class, splitOn=",", writeDelimiter=",") private List<String> cast
      List of cast members, with each member stored as a String of first and last name

    • showingStatus

      @CsvBindByName(column="showingStatus") private String showingStatus
      Showing status of the movie

    • ageRating

      @CsvBindByName(column="ageRating") private String ageRating
      Age rating of the movie

    • reviews

      @CsvBindAndSplitByName(elementType=Review.class, collectionType=java.util.ArrayList.class, splitOn=",", converter=TextToReview.class, writeDelimiter=",") private List<Review> reviews
      List of all the reviews for the movie

    • saleCounter

      @CsvBindByName(column="saleCounter") private int saleCounter
      A counter of how many tickets have been sold for the movie

    • Movie

      public Movie(String movieTitle, String synopis, String director, List<String> cast, String showingStatus, String ageRating)
      Creates a new Movie with the following parameters and initialising sales to 0
      Parameters:
      movieTitle - Title of the movie
      synopis - Short synopsis describing the movie
      director - Name of the director
      cast - List of cast members
      showingStatus - Showing status of the movie
      ageRating - Age rating of the movie
